user¶

main¶

User main Controller

class spam.controllers.user.main.Controller(*args, **kwargs)¶

REST controller for managing users.

In addition to the standard REST verbs this controller defines the following REST-like methods:

  • add_to_group (get_add_to_group(), post_add_to_group())
  • remove_from_group (remove_from_group())
  • add_admins (get_add_admins(), post_add_admins())
  • remove_admin (remove_admin())
  • add_supervisors (get_add_supervisors(), post_add_supervisors())
  • remove_supervisor (remove_supervisor())
  • add_artists (get_add_artists(), post_add_artists())
  • remove_artist (remove_artist())
edit(user_id, **kwargs)¶

Display a EDIT form.

get_add_admins(proj, **kwargs)¶

Display a ADD users form.

get_add_artists(proj, category_id, **kwargs)¶

Display a ADD artists form.

get_add_supervisors(proj, category_id, **kwargs)¶

Display a ADD supervisors form.

get_add_to_group(group_id, **kwargs)¶

Display a ADD users form.

get_all()¶

Return a tabbed page for user tabs.

get_delete(user_id, **kwargs)¶

Display a DELETE confirmation form.

get_one(name)¶

Handle the home page.

new(**kwargs)¶

Display a NEW form.

post(user_name, display_name, password)¶

Create a new user

post_add_admins(proj, userids)¶

Add administrators to a project

post_add_artists(proj, category_id, userids)¶

Add artists to a category

post_add_supervisors(proj, category_id, userids)¶

Add supervisors to a category

post_add_to_group(group_id, userids)¶

Add users to a group

post_delete(user_id)¶

Delete a user.

put(user_id, display_name=None)¶

Edit a user

remove_admin(proj, user_id)¶

Remove an administrator from a project

remove_artist(proj, category_id, user_id)¶

Remove an artist from a category

remove_from_group(user_id, group_id)¶

Remove a user from a group

remove_supervisor(proj, category_id, user_id)¶

Remove a supervisor from a category

tabs¶

User tabs

class spam.controllers.user.tabs.TabController(*args, **kwargs)¶

The controller for user tabs.

groups()¶

Handle the ‘groups’ tab.

This tab allows to add users to the SPAM administrators group.

users()¶

Handle the ‘users’ tab.

This tab allows to add, remove and edit SPAM users. Users added here can then be assigned to a project as artists or supervisors in the project’s users tab: spam.controllers.project.tabs.users().
